Proxy - number portability 22835073

Do you need a new SIM card?

It is possible to make a number portability for Telenor, despite the fact that you still are binding or have a notice period with your current operator. If you want to move your number to Telenor before the expiry of the vesting period or notice period you should be aware that you will be charged the subscription for the remainder of the vesting period / notice period. Therefore the risk of having to pay subscription both Telenor and your current company for a period. If you do not put a date number will be transferred to Telenor when binding and or notice period with current company expires.

Terms and conditions for number portability
